[9](9.html) nine bows  

Traditional Egyptian name for a confederation of 9 enemy tribes/nations.

Compare with Chinese [Chiyou](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chiyou) (èš©å°¤), leader of the Nine Li tribe (ä¹é»). Arch Enemy of the first Chinese Dynasty, the [Xia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xia_dynasty).  

The Shu of Sichuan, who conquered the [Shang](china), had a bronze bird tree with nine flower buds and nine birds on them.
